body:
Hello everybody,

I hope I am not touching upon a topic already discussed, but I could not find anything around the forum about it.

When running "blockMesh" component in the indoor_airflow example, I get this error.



"1. Solution exception:Error checking TLS connection: Error checking and/or regenerating the certs: There was an error validating certificates for host "192.168.99.100:2376": read tcp 192.168.99.1:58842->192.168.99.100:2376: wsarecv: An established connection was aborted by the software in your host machine.

You can attempt to regenerate them using 'docker-machine regenerate-certs [name]'.

Be advised that this will trigger a Docker daemon restart which will stop running containers."



What is that due to? What should I check?

I am running Rhino as admin, and also set VM e docker to run as admin.



Thank you.
topic: Butterfly // "1. Solution exception:Error checking TLS connection"

replies.body:
Hi Luca, As far as I know and working with the butterfly.

I only set "Rhino", "OF_Env_Create" and "OpenFOAM_Start" as admin.

My VM run as default user.

This setting works for me.

 

Best.

-Omid
